Title: Picasa Viewer for Windows Phone 7
Description:
This is a simple reader for Picasa that allows the user to browser all his Picasa Album and download single photos.

This is the first release, tested only in the Windows Phone Emulator...in the next week, new features will be released.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
This is a simple reader for Picasa created for Windows Phone 7.

The application allows the user to browser all his Picasa Album and download single photos.

I tested only the emulator...if someone test it on a real windows phone, please send me a feedback with the reaction of the application. Thank you very much

Next Features to improve:

1) Download a complete Picasa Album

2) Create a new Picasa Album

3) Upload  one or more photos in a Picasa Album
